author: mandrigin
content: Would it be possible to schedule next meetings a bit earlier? Afaik it was at 22:00 CEST, so its a big stretch at least to me to be able to join at that time.

author: bridge-bot
content: <sigpaul> The previous call was 6am for me, I think the idea is to rotate the hours so everyone shares the pain.

author: bridge-bot
content: <sigpaul> Turns out the world is larger than the US and Europe!

author: mandrigin
content: Yeah, I understand your pain, because meetings usually are US/Europe centered. Sure, if the idea is to rotate hours, I don't mind that. I somehow missed that.

author: paulhauner
content: I think that's the plan, <@!203220829473996800> will confirm. Sorry if I sounded condescending before, I didn't mean that.

author: mandrigin
content: I'll read up the notes a bit more then

author: protolambda
content: See notes, we'll do rotating call times, and more regular, but optional, calls. I'll share a schedule here later today. First one tomorrow likely.

author: protolambda
content:
```
| PT (-7)    | UTC                | CET (+2)  | AEST  (+10) |
| 02:00 Fri  | 09:00 Fri April 9  | 11:00 Fri | 19:00 Fri   |
<weekend>
| 10:00 Mon  | 17:00 Mon April 12 | 19:00 Mon | 03:00 Tue   |
| 18:00 Wed  | 01:00 Thu April 15 | 03:00 Thu | 11:00 Thu   |
| 02:00 Fri  | 09:00 Fri April 16 | 11:00 Fri | 19:00 Fri   |
<weekend>
| 10:00 Mon  | 17:00 Mon April 19 | 19:00 Mon | 03:00 Tue   |
| 18:00 Wed  | 01:00 Thu April 22 | 03:00 Thu | 11:00 Thu   |
| 02:00 Fri  | 09:00 Fri April 23 | 11:00 Fri | 19:00 Fri   |

Continued every week
```

Schedule for the office hour calls. 3 per week, rotating with 8 hours at a time.
These are **optional**, just there for you to sync up. I'll try to be at most of them to bridge any conversation.

We'll host them here in discord, using the new discord voice channel stage thing, in #rayonism-calls. You can hop in and out as listener. Discord mods and stage-mods can put people on-stage (allow listener to unmute). This is an experiment, we'll use normal voice channels if it doesn't work.
Around the start of the hackathon, maybe Mon 19 we could do another big Zoom call if deemed necessary.
For now we focus on quick iteration towards the first devnet.
